(I know, that's why I focused on the neck. I assumed it would be the 
least part with quills. But forget it.)

Trainers

When Prebon attempted to throw Spears into the way of the missles, 
Quills shot all over his body. This was luck however, because this 
caused him to fall down and the missles to zoom over his body and 
explode away. The removed most of the quills from his face, however 
painfully, and stared down Spears.

"Not a good thing to do. Now you are going to have a terrbile fate. 
Trainers! Become Tamron!

Ignatius, Hammer and Bullet left there battle and ran over to Prebon. 
Blaze hissed at Snow Cat as she clawed at her, but was able to sink 
her teeth into Snow Cat's shoulder. She withdrew and went over to the 
others.

"Now," said Prebon, "You shall be with us forever!"

The Trainers started to merge, to become one. When it was all over, 
they were the great Tamron! They pulled out their great weapon, Tamer.

"I have seen pictures of you in Savage's memories," said Tamron, "So 
I suppose you wondered how we go thim under control. It's simple. 
Using this baby right here, we implanted a micro chip in him. Once it 
hits the surface, it auto-matically takes effect, making him a slave. 
Now yo probably think I'm dumb for telling you all about this 
machine. It doesn't matter. You will now be one of us!"

Tamron shot a micro chip at Spears.
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois lead Child into a small, way off room, where he sat him down 
on a rock beside him. He put his hands on his face.

"Close your eyes, Child. You are now going to experience more joy and 
power than most people can ever dream of."

Vulois began channeling energy into Child.
